title: Good news day
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation and Phillip Mark-Law
brief_description: This film makes a statement about the attractiveness and cultural diversity of the Australian way of life by comparing scenes from Adelaide with the screaming headlines of newspapers and radio.
creator_credit_for_label: South Australian Film Corporation and Phillip Mark-Law
